articles.author: Ellen Francis, Claire Parker
articles.title: Europeans press Iran on nuclear curbs, but Geneva talks yield no breakthrough - The Washington Post
articles.description: European officials urged Iran to restrict its nuclear program to prevent the U.S. from joining Israel’s attacks, but President Donald Trump called the meeting unhelpful.
articles.content: GENEVA European foreign ministers pressed their Iranian counterpart on Friday for curbs to Tehrans nuclear program,but the high-stakes meeting in Geneva yieldedno quick off-ramp from the conflictin w… [+9188 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Botafogo upset PSG 1-0 at FIFA Club World Cup - Al Jazeera
articles.description: Igor Jesus’ 36th minute goal was enough for Botafago to defeat the Europeans champions PSG at the Rose Bowl in LA.
articles.content:
Paris Saint-Germain (PSG) suffered a shock 1-0 Club World Cup defeat against Brazilian side Botafogo in a hard-fought battle between the reigning champions of Europe and South America.
